name: LAND/LORD
description:
LAND/LORD is a trivial strategy game for the ZX Spectrum, made with the BASin development environment. It's a clone of the classic Hamurabi, ported -- with improvements -- from the one I wrote for my BASIC book, in turn based on Russell Glasser's online version.

I've been meaning to make this improved version for a while now; the ZX Spectrum BASIC Game Jam provided the motivation.

You can play the game online courtesy of the JSSpeccy emulator. BASIC source code is included in the snapshot; just end the game when prompted to, and list it. Use as you wish, and enjoy!
